pkgmetadata.longdescription: Finite Mixture Models and meta-analysis tools - based on C.A.MAN // Tools for the analysis of finite semiparametric mixtures. These are useful when data is heterogeneous, e.g. in pharmacokinetics or meta-analysis. The NPMLE and VEM algorithms (flexible support size) and EM algorithms (fixed support size) are provided for univariate and bivariate data
